name: 10,000 (floodpoolform)
description:
Play as one of the 10,000 Immortals of Persia during their invasion of Sparta in this 2d action game inspired by the classic flash game "Achilles". Use your sword, bow, and spear to kill the unruly Spartans that defy King Xerxes. 

Disclaimer: This was a student project completed over the course of a semester with many of its sprites and animations coming from free assets on the Unity Store.
